website_summaries.verdict: Great choice if you need a professional-quality clamp meter. If you have limited use for a clamp meter, though, you might look for a less expensive unit.
pros: Pro-level item — has big jaws, provides fast readings, and can be used for a wide array of electrical applications
Suited for linear and nonlinear jobs
cons: It's a tool suited for professionals and that means you'll pay a higher price for this somewhat expensive item

customer_reviews.title: Dated, but still handy
customer_reviews.text: I got a new one of these with damaged packaging for a very low price. I wanted something for intermittent use at a remote cabin to check battery bank loads, solar charging, etc. While I have a very accurate shunt on the system, with the clamp I can check any of the dozens of wires going from individual solar panels, batteries, loads, etc. to get more information.
customer_reviews.author: JRod

customer_reviews.title: was lied to
customer_reviews.text: I got this for amp readings on automotive and I asked community and the people selling it and was told it will read amps on automotive side, NOT, so now I have another regular meter
customer_reviews.author: gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Deserves its good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Oh baby! If there was a sexy ac/dc multimeter, this would be it. Wonderful. I love it. The only thing I could wish for is that the metal tips of the leads were longer. I need to use the leads from my el cheapo multimeter if it's a tight measure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, I use it to measure the amps coming from my solar panels into my charge controller and so far the readings match those of the readings on the charge controller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice unit for decent price
customer_reviews.text: nice unit for decent price,,only thing that dont like to much is the slider switch,,its kinda hard to tell sometimes what it is set on ,,Great meter for the price,,just needs a little better switch arrangement for us older guys with not so good eyes!
customer_reviews.author: trek45

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im the only at work with this ac/dc clamp now everyone wants to borrow it.
customer_reviews.author: E W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in most regards
customer_reviews.text: Awesome in most regards. For some reason though, measuring voltage between output phases is really inaccurate. All other meters used read almost 100V lower than this one consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Piggims

customer_reviews.title: Old Faithful....amprobe
customer_reviews.text: nothing like the best. AC/DC means for standard construction and industrial use as well as control DC circuitry........
customer_reviews.author: doc watson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Meter
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use on the job and has worked flawlessly every time. Amprob makes great quality meters along with fluke, only two brands I trust when it comes to meter testing.
customer_reviews.author: Young NYer 10

customer_reviews.title: probing for amps conveniently and with value
customer_reviews.text: Done good first time out. Once scraping the ends of some really corroded jumper cables showed a 15 amp pull from my little Honda's alternator to a big Ramcharger truck battery that went dead. Got it settled down a little to 12.5 amp and started the truck. Probed the truck alternator and found it delivering 70 amp to it's battery. Highest I ever saw was an 80 amp draw on a 12 volt alternator that was hooked up to do welding underground in a coal mine with a probe that cost three times the price. Invaluable tool.
customer_reviews.author: minorwork

customer_reviews.title: Works like it said it would
customer_reviews.text: Works like it said it would...I love it...............Help me do my job faster so I can injoy a Donut from Donken Donuts
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wall

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my solar project. It does pretty well measuring DC amps through the clamp. The cheapest I could find that does DC amps with a clamp and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CLAMP
customer_reviews.text: It just what I need to handle the load I was working with! Might oder another one in the future !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Warren

product_meta.title: Amprobe ACDC-100 TRMS 1000A AC/DC Digital Clamp Meter
product_meta.description: Style:ACDC-100 TRMS: AC/DC TRMS Clamp MeterAmprobe products range from an extensive line of clamp meters and digital multimeters to industry-specific tools for residential/commercial electricians, HVAC/R technicians, utilities and industrial maintenance professionals. All Amprobe tools undergo rigorous testing to ensure full compliance with the latest IEC and CE safety regulations in Fluke Safety labs for quality and safety you can trust.
feature_bullets: Digital clamp meter measures alternating current (AC) to 800 amp direct current (DC) to 1,000 amp, DC voltage and AC voltage to 600 volts (V), capacitance to 3,000 microfarads, and resistance to 40 megaohms
True RMS (root mean square) sensing meter provides accurate readings when measuring linear or non-linear loads, where the current or voltage has a sinusoidal or nonsinusoidal waveform
Hall-effect current clamp with 2" (50mm) jaw opening measures current without touching or interrupting the circuit
Inrush reading displays measurement of entire motor inrush period at startup
Meets International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) safety standard 61010 and is certified for category III installations up to 600V

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
